com

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

    Controller Class for JavaFX Project

    Class used for interfacing between the JavaFX GUI and the back-end calculations. Binds all the actions of the GUI and creates nodes such as the PDF preview pagination.

    Credit to james-d for sections of the code relating to the PDF previewing.

    Author:
    Jagan Prem, james-d

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  Controller.PageDimensions
      Struct-like class intended to represent the physical dimensions of a page in pixels (as opposed to the dimensions of the (possibly zoomed) view.

                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Reads in the values from .config (i.e. the location of the .MER file and the the GUI colors.)

        java.io.FileNotFoundException - When .config is not found.

      • sendEmail

        private void sendEmail(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> recipients,
                       java.lang.String subject,
                       java.lang.String body)
        Sends an email to the specified recipient addresses with a provided subject and body text and with the seating chart attached.
        Parameters:
        recipients - The email addresses to send the chart to.
        subject - The subject line of the emails sent out.
        body - The message body of the emails to be sent.

      • bindEmailButton

        private void bindEmailButton()
        Binds the email button to open a dialog in which the user can enter a subject and body for the emails. When the button at the bottom is pressed, the email is sent the teachers currently on the seating chart.
        See Also:
        emailButton, classCopy

      • selectMerFile

        public void selectMerFile()
        Creates the method for the button used for selecting the .MER file, which creates an open file dialog for the user to select to select the file.
        See Also:
        pathToMer, classPeriodFiller, periods

      • addAll

        private void addAll(org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDDocument doc,
                    java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>[][][] seatingChart)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Adds the values from the generated seating chart to the PDF template and flattens the form.
        Parameters:
        doc - The document to add the fields in.
        seatingChart - The seating chart to fill in from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When a PDF field is not found.

      • generateSeatingChart

        public void generateSeatingChart()
        Creates a seating chart based on the specified conditions and saves it to a new temporary file. Handles any errors encountered in the process and displays fitting messages.
        See Also:
        classes, classCopy, seatingHandler, grades, male, female

      • createAndConfigureImageLoadService

        private void createAndConfigureImageLoadService()
        Creates the image loader for the PDF preview and threads it.
        See Also:
        imageLoadService

      • bindPaginationToCurrentFile

        private void bindPaginationToCurrentFile()
        Binds the pagination to mirror the file that is currently loaded.
        See Also:
        currentFile, pagination

      • bindZoomKeys

        private void bindZoomKeys()
        Binds the zoom value to change the zoom of the pagination and adds listening for plus and minus to change the zoom of the preview.
        See Also:
        zoom, currentZoomLabel, pagination

      • createPaginationPageFactory

        private void createPaginationPageFactory()
        Binds the pagination to change with the page and file selection.
        See Also:
        pagination, currentFile

      • loadFile

        private void loadFile(java.io.File file)
        Loads the specified PDF file into the preview pagination.
        Parameters:
        file - The File object to be loaded.
        See Also:
        pagination, fitOnLoad

      • zoomIn

        private void zoomIn()
        Method for the zoom in button to increase the zoom of the preview. Zooms by a factor of 1.2.
        See Also:
        zoomOut(), zoomFit(), ZOOM_DELTA

      • zoomOut

        private void zoomOut()
        Method for the zoom out button to decrease the zoom of the preview. Zooms by a factor of 1.2.
        See Also:
        zoomIn(), zoomFit(), ZOOM_DELTA

      • zoomFit

        private void zoomFit()
        Method for the zoom fit button to match the size of the preview to the size of the pagination.
        See Also:
        zoomIn(), zoomOut()

      • updateImage

        private void updateImage(int pageNumber)
        Updates the pagination preview with an image node rendered from the selected PDF file at the current zoom level; zooms to fit if directly after loading the file.
        Parameters:
        pageNumber - The page number of the PDF file to render.
        See Also:
        pagination, fitOnLoad

      • showErrorMessage

        private void showErrorMessage(java.lang.String message,
                              java.lang.Throwable exception)
        Shows an error message on the GUI based on a provided message and exception.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to display on the modal box.
        exception - The exception to show in detail.
